mng: to hire, to rent, to charter, to rent out, to lease out, rent, land tax

exm.mng: to rent and use, lend-lease (US device to provide war materiel to its allies during WW2)
to rent, to lease, to hire
settlement, international settlement in many Chinese cities established under unequal treaties from 1860
taxation, in former times, esp. land tax
rent for a room or house
